get.description: Retrieve information on point of service of the bank

parameters.name: province
parameters.description: Province location of point of service

parameters.name: district
parameters.description: District location of point of service

parameters.name: branchCode
parameters.description: Branch code of point of service

address.description: Address information of point of service

geoLocation.description: Geolocation information of point of service

contact.description: Contact information of point of service

houseNumber.description: Identification of a location on street address

unitNumber.description: Identification of a suite or apartment

floorNumber.description: Floor or storey within a building

alleyName.description: Name of an alley branch out from the street

streetName.description: Name of a street or thoroughfare

subDistrict.description: Identification of a sub-division of a district

district.description: Name of a district, ie, a part of a town or region

province.description: A territory governed as an administrative or political unit of a country

countryCode.description: Country of the address  (according to ISO 3166, Alpha-2)

postalCode.description: Identifier consisting of a group of letters and/or numbers that is added to a postal address to assist the sorting of mail

latitude.description: Latitude measured in degrees, minutes and seconds, following by 'N' for the north and 'S' for the south of the equator

longitude.description:
Angular measurement of the distance of a location on the earth east or west of the Greenwich observatory. 
The longitude is measured in degrees, minutes and seconds, following by 'E' for the east and 'W' for the west

phoneNumber.description:
Collection of information that identifies a phone number, as defined by telecom services. 
It is recommended to use only numbers and limited punctuation +,-.(.)

faxNumber.description:
Collection of information that identifies a fax number, as defined by telecom services. 
It is recommended to use only numbers and limited punctuation +,-.(.)
